document.full_text: jamie dimon, chief executive officer of the second-largest u.s. bank by assets, saw his total compensation rise to $20.8 million in 2010, according to a regulatory filing by jpmorgan chase & co .
document.title: jpmorgan's dimon got $20.8 million in 2010
lines_and_colors: jamie dimon, chief executive officer of the second-largest u.s. bank by assets, saw his total compensation rise to $20.8 million in 2010, according to a regulatory filing by jpmorgan chase & co .
